text:
Eoin Colfer (born 14 May 1965) is an Irish author. He is most well known as the author of the "Artemis Fowl" books. Colfer was born in Wexford in Ireland and still lives there with his wife and children.
O'Brien Flyers.
"A series of books by several authors for young readers."
The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.
"The first five novels in The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy series were written by Douglas Adams. Colfer has written a sixth."
